description.en:
This task type requires the player to reach the specified dimension. 
For this task, the player is required to reach the Overworld.
description.ru:
This task type requires the player to reach the specified dimension. 
For this task, the player is required to reach the Overworld.
description.zh:
该任务类型需要玩家到达指定维度。
对于该任务，需要玩家到达主世界。
